name: Onu is meditating
tooltip:
Onu is meditating

I am meditating on your task, <name>.  Meditating on reasons why the Twilight's Hammer and naga are here.

When you are ready, use the phial of scrying to create a scrying bowl.  Then, contact me through the bowl.

If you have lost your phial of scrying, then here is another.
